data.name: Mirror Byte
data.description:
Write a function that receives a byte value and returns the "mirror" of that byte value

The byte value is mirrored by converting it to 8 bits and reversing those bits

For example:

- 0 == 00000000 --> 00000000 == 0
- 1 == 00000001 --> 10000000 == 128
- 2 == 00000010 --> 01000000 == 64
- 3 == 00000011 --> 11000000 == 192

Optional Code Golf Challenge:

If the submitted code is all on a single line (with no line feed character at the end) then the tests performed will include a number of codelength checks. The first target is to write the code in 128 characters (or less). Once the target has been met, the target will reduce. Can you find the match or beat the ultimate target?
